teach me to gather the nectar from the
flowers that bloom in the garden of
human souls
so that i may produce the honey of thy
delight
i shall stir thy love and forgiveness in
my heart
so that the fragrance of thy beauty
shall shine
from me
and when winter comes with its cold
blasts
i shall be covered with thy blanket of
peace
and love even though
earthly separation dance around
i may my feet followed the footprints
of thy beloved one who drawed the earth
before me
so that i may also say
father i have shown
what thou art to all men and hear thy
voice say
deep in my soul
well done good and faithful servant
thou hast proved by faith
indeed
